title: Are the Greeks still a force in the field of mathematics as they were thousands of years ago? - Quora

response.answer_text: [heavy echoed voice] Ladies and gentlemen… men… men… men… I present to you… you… you… you…  Constantine Caratheodory!!! One of the most famous in the field, Caratheodory shown that the Greeks still have the art of μαθηματικά.
